---
title: "Four bands perform on metal bill"
date: 2019-03-29
description: "Metal music fans are in for a treat as four live bands, including Drxnes will perform in the clubrooms at Oceanview Speedway..."
image: 
excerpt: "Metal music fans are in for a treat as four live bands, including Drxnes will perform in the clubrooms at Oceanview Speedway."

---

<p class="element element-paragraph"><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Image result for the drxnes nz" /></p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">Metal music fans are in for a treat this Saturday night as four live bands, including&nbsp;<strong>Drxnes</strong> will perform in the Charlie Berntsen clubrooms at Oceanview Speedway on Saturday night.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph"><br />Whanganui bands Mr Sudden Death and <strong>Drxnes</strong>&nbsp;(former WHS students) will be joined by Precursor from Palmerston North and Pale Flag from Auckland.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">Pale Flag formed last year and feature Whanganui-born guitarist Liam Donald.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">The band say they play "hard-hitting original music aimed to get the crowd moshing".</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">The three-piece Mr Sudden Death play a mix of punk, rock, grunge, metal, rap, sludge, country, doom and alternative music.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">Drxnes are reputed to produce "mean sound from an awesome bunch of musicians" and the 5-year-old Palmerston North band seem to be a bit of a mystery.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">Curious punters can find out more on Saturday night and there will be a complimentary courtesy coach to transport people to and from the venue.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">Those who would like a ride to Oceanview should call 021 0231 7276 to make a booking.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph">Pick up is outside Property Brokers by the City Bridge and drop off will be at the Red Lion afterwards.</p>
<p class="element element-paragraph"><strong>Wanganui Metal Assault: Charlie Berntsen Clubrooms, Oceanview Speedway, Landguard Rd, Whanganui. Saturday, March 30 from 8pm. Entry $15 at the gate.</strong></p>
<p class="element element-paragraph"><em>By Liz Wylie</em><br /><em>Whanganui Chronicle 29/3/19</em></p>
